item.title: Build Dotnet Core With Travis
item.description: Hello! Today I want to show how you can build and deploy .net core with Travis. To get started, you need to create a Travis account. This requires you to login with your GitHub account. .travis.yml Configuration The next step is to create a .travis.yml file in the root of the repository.
